title: North Carolina Downtown Durham City Stay with Onsite Art Gallery & Restaurant
description:
Housed within a meticulously restored 1930s Art Deco building, this unique retreat features a rotating collection of thought-provoking artworks and installations, seamlessly blending museum-quality experiences with elevated hotel comforts.

Dine at Counting House, where locally sourced seafood and Southern-inspired plates are served beneath dramatic vault ceilings. Explore the nearby American Tobacco Campus, home to acclaimed restaurants, craft breweries and live music venues. For a cultural fix, the Nasher Museum of Art and Duke Universityâ€™s storied campus are just a short drive away.

title: Durham Refined Northern England Stay with Charming Castle and Cathedral Views
description: In the heart of this heritage city bursting with character, the Hotel Indigo Durham, an IHG Hotel, provides a refined stay behind the facade of a former university building. Awaken refreshed in a soothing room before invigorating your body at the fitness centre or heading out to sample local produce and explore picturesque city streets. As evening approaches, savour a delectable steak at Marco Pierre White Steakhouse Bar & Grill or a craft beer and tapas at the Rotunda Bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Durham, an IHG Hotel
